instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open Google Maps mobile web or the Google Maps app . Touch and hold a place to drop a pin on Google Maps. At the bottom, tap the address or description. Scroll down to find the plus code, such as 8439VCW3V+PG .
On your Android phone or tablet, open Google Maps mobile web or the Google Maps app . At the top, tap the search box and type the plus code.
